    Methods

    protected

    • copy() — Disconnect the global enviroment, turning stale
    • getContentType() — Get the MIME from the Content-Type header
    • parseBody() — Parse the body based on the content type.
    • parseBodyIsRequired() — Check if the body needs to be (re-)parsed
    • parseJsonBody() — Parse json body
    • parseUrlEncodedBody() — Parse 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' body
    • parseXmlBody() — Parse XML body
    • resetParsedBody() — Reset the parsed body, excepted if it was explicitly set
    • setPostData() — Set as parsed body, but only if Content-Type is of form upload
    • shouldUsePostData() — Check if we should use post data rather than parsing the body

    public

    • getBody() — Get the body
    • getHeaderLine() — Get a header as string
    • getParsedBody() — Retrieve any parameters provided in the request body.
    • getServerParams() — Get the server paramaters (typically $_SERVER)
    • withParsedBody() — Return an instance with the specified body parameters.
